title: You can grow new brain cells. Here's how - Sandrine Thuret

options.label: B
options.text: Neurogenesis is the cure for depression.

options.label: C
options.text: Neurogenesis is linked to depression, and blocking neurogenesis can block the efficacy of antidepressants.

options.label: D
options.text: Neurogenesis has no link to depression.

options.label: A
options.text: Diet has no effect on mental health, memory, and mood.

options.label: B

options.label: D

options.label: B
options.text: Calorie restriction has no effect on neurogenesis.

multiple-choice.question: What is the effect of a high-fat diet on neurogenesis?

options.label: B
options.text: A high-fat diet has no effect on neurogenesis.

multiple-choice.question: What is the effect of a soft diet on neurogenesis?

options.label: B
options.text: A soft diet has no effect on neurogenesis.

multiple-choice.question: What is the relationship between resveratrol and neurogenesis?

options.label: B
options.text: Resveratrol has no effect on neurogenesis.

title: What makes you special?

options.label: B

options.label: A

options.label: B
options.text: She was disappointed with the outcome of the election and felt sad.

options.label: C
options.text: She was tasked with covering the election but didn't have a personal connection to it.

options.label: D
options.text: She didn't cover the election and was focused on other stories.

multiple-choice.question: What was the impact of Mariana's sister's car accident on their family?

options.label: A
options.text: Mariana's sister made a full recovery and was back to normal within a few weeks.

options.label: B
options.text: Mariana's sister suffered a spinal cord injury and required extensive medical treatment.

options.label: C
options.text: Mariana's sister passed away in the accident.

options.label: D
options.text: Mariana's sister was not affected by the accident.

multiple-choice.question: What did Mariana learn from her sister's experience?

options.label: A
options.text: She learned that people with disabilities are not capable of achieving their goals.

options.label: B
options.text: She learned that people with disabilities are resilient and can overcome challenges.

options.label: C
options.text: She learned that people with disabilities are a burden on society.

options.label: D
options.text: She learned that people with disabilities are not worthy of love and respect.

multiple-choice.question: What is the main message of Mariana's story?

options.label: A
options.text: Embracing differences is not important and can lead to conflict.

options.label: B
options.text: Embracing differences is crucial in breaking down stereotypes and promoting inclusivity.

options.label: C
options.text: Embracing differences is only important in certain situations.

options.label: D
options.text: Embracing differences is not necessary in today's society.

multiple-choice.question: What did Mariana do to humanize and give voice to marginalized communities?

options.label: A
options.text: She wrote a book about her experiences as a journalist.

options.label: B
options.text: She created a documentary about the challenges faced by immigrant families.

options.label: C
options.text: She covered the 2016 US presidential election and highlighted the stories of marginalized communities.

options.label: D
options.text: She started a non-profit organization to support marginalized communities.

multiple-choice.question: What is the importance of reimagining oneself beyond societal expectations?

options.label: A
options.text: It is not necessary to reimage oneself and can lead to conflict.

options.label: B
options.text: It is crucial to reimage oneself and can lead to personal growth and understanding.

options.label: C
options.text: It is only important to reimage oneself in certain situations.

options.label: D
options.text: It is not possible to reimage oneself and is a waste of time.

multiple-choice.question: What is the main takeaway from Mariana's story?

options.label: A
options.text: Nobody has a claim on the word "normal" and we are all unique and special.

options.label: B
options.text: Embracing differences is not important and can lead to conflict.

options.label: C
options.text: We should only celebrate our own individuality and not appreciate the differences that make others special.

options.label: D
options.text: We should ignore our differences and focus on what we have in common.
